author: Irina Ivanova
title: Amazon fires worker who organized warehouse walkout
description: "This was a targeted retaliation," assistant manager Christian Smalls told CBS MoneyWatch. Amazon says otherwise.
content:
An Amazon warehouse assistant manager who organized a walkout from the company's Staten Island, New York, facility has been fired.
Chris Smalls lost his job on Monday after helping lead a protest over what some workers claim is the company's lack of precauti… [+3487 chars]
